advancements.sanguine_echo_achievement.d: Cast an Echo on a weapon using Sanguine Echo
advancements.evil_fragment_goal.descr: Slay a vengeful spirit and obtain an evil fragment
advancements.soulfilled_ingot_goal.title: White metal
desc.hatred_unleashed.line2: Call tormented souls upon your foes
desc.hatred_unleashed.line3: Consumes 8 soul from Soul Catcher and 5 HP of user
desc.seppuku.line2: Pierce yourself with your weapon to instantly activate Bleeding on both nearby mobs and yourself
gamerule.bleedingDamage.description: Damage that Bleeding will deal on activation
desc.soulflame_prayer_book.line3: Each prayer grants passive effect when this item is worn
desc.soulflame_prayer_book.line2: Prayer sheet can be either a soulflame one (central slot) or a regular one (radial slots)
desc.spine_remover: Allows user to execute backstabs that deal increased damage
advancements.hunt_achievement.title: Night of the Hunt
gamerule.ghostsSpawnAfterDeath.descripti: Defines if ghosts of all sorts can appear after a mob died
advancements.spirit_fragment_goal.title: Soulbending
desc.echoes.line3: Echoes can be applied to some weapons via Sanguine Altar
advancements.hunt_achievement.descr: Slay an otherwordly creature for "Stars of Ruin" event from IterRPG mod
desc.echoes.line2: Echoes are special abilities that can be used with right click
advancements.possesed_achievement.title: Devil in I
desc.ghostly_form.line2: Dash forward in a ghostly form dealing damage to mobs in the way
advancements.soul_catcher_goal.descr: Create the Soul Cathcer, a vessel for rogue spirits
advancements.spirit_fragment_goal.descr: Obtain a spirit fragment from an angry spirit
desc.bloody_slash.line2: Makes a bloody slash that deals damage affects targets with Bleeding
desc.eye_of_sanguinius.line1: Attacking an enemy affected by Bleeding restores hunger and sometimes health
desc.eye_of_sanguinius.line2: If the attacked enemy isn't affected by Bleeding you'll apply Bleeding to yourself
gamerule.ghostsSpawnAfterDeath: Can ghosts spawn after a mob dies
gamerule.bleedingActivation.description: Level of Bleeding on which it's effect activates
advancements.evil_fragment_goal.title: Dark Arts
desc.dr_faust.line4: If you have no Unbound Blood in the inventroy you'll take additional damage when hurt
desc.dr_faust.line3: When you are hurt you lose Unbound Blood from your inventory
desc.dr_faust.line2: Amount of Unbound Blood dropped scales with the damage dealt
desc.bloodboon_ritual.line2: Raise the Sacred Spear to pierce the very skies and rain omenous blood upon your foes
desc.dr_faust.line1: Agressive mobs can drop Unbound Blood when hurt
desc.dark_oath.line2: Take a defensive stance cursing every entity nearby
desc.dark_oath.line3: Consumes 4 soul from Soul Catcher and 4 HP of user
advancements.soul_catcher_goal.title: Heart of many hearts
advancements.blood_vial_challenge.title: Enough to make a man sick
desc.soul_catcher.line2: Soul can be used for unleashing various miracles
desc.soul_catcher.line3: Durability represents the amount of soul stored
advancements.sacred_spear_challenge.titl: Miquella is mine and mine alone
desc.soulflame_ignition.line2: Casts an eruption of soulflame that deals damage based on target's max health
advancements.unbound_blood_goal.descr: Make an unbound blood from a flower that blooms after slaughter
advancements.hexing_spear_challenge.desc: Activate Deathbound effect with tormented souls called from Hatred Unleashed
desc.evil_aura.line2: Unleash vengeful flame launching targets upwards
desc.evil_aura.line3: Consumes 4 soul from Soul Catcher and 2 HP of user
advancements.possesed_achievement.descr: Slay a possesed beast and have evil spirits reside in your weapon
gamerule.universalBleeding.description: Defines if Bleeding can be applied to all mobs
advancements.unbound_blood_goal.title: Sanguimancy
gamerule.defaulBleedingApplication.descr: A default level of Bleeding application via weapons
advancements.blood_vial_challenge.descr: Activate Bleeding on yourself via excessive blood vial usage
advancements.blood_pact_achievement.desc: Activate the effect of Blood Pact
